text: “Yenza kube ngummiselo kuthi okulungileyo kweli hlabathi, nakuBomi oBuzayo. Inene thina siguqukela kuWe.” Wathi Yena: “Isohlwayo saM Ndohlwaya ngaso lowo Ndithe Ndathanda ukanti iNceba yaM igubungela izinto zonke. Yona Ndiya kuyenza ummiselo kwabanyulu, abanikela ngeZakâh nabo bakholwa kwimiqondiso yeThu.”
